body.name: Nuwave Bravo Convection Toaster Ovens Air Fryer Combo with 30QT Large Capacity For A Whole Chicken and 13" Pizza. Multi-Layer Cooking, Probe Feature, 100+ Presets One-Touch Smart Control Countertop
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 46 mins
features: 112 PRESETS- Bravo convection oven is programmed with 12 preset cooking functions for air frying, grilling, baking, broiling, roasting, dehydrating, reheating, defrosting, toasting & more. It also has additional 100 pre-programmed recipe presets

MULTI-LAYER COOKING - With 4 rack positions and multi-purpose racks, multi-layer cooking is more convenient than ever before. Bravo toaster oven air fryer combo’s heavy-duty racks can withstand loads over 30 pounds. Cooking delicious meals for the entire family is now easy

INTUITIVE DIGITAL CONTROLS - Set cook temperatures from 50°F to 500°F adjustable in precise 5°F increments. Unlike the primitive methods that regulate temperature by turning the heater on and off, our heater never turns off while cooking

INTEGRATED SMART DIGITAL THERMOMETER – Once the desired doneness temperature is set, Bravo constantly monitors the internal temperature of your food and automatically ends the cooking process when the desired internal temperature is reached

SAVE YOUR OWN RECIPES – Bravo air fryer toaster oven has built-in 50 memory slots where you can save your own favorite recipes. If your favorite recipe is perfected, save it. You can recall it any time for the next perfect meal

MAKE ADJUSTMENTS ON-THE-FLY – Want hotter temperature or need to cook it longer? Simply adjust on-the-fly any time. Fine-tune time and temperature any time in the cooking process. Bravo air fryer’s intuitive digital controls are easy to operate

LINEAR THERMAL (LINEAR T) TECHNOLOGY – Linear T executes the set temp accurately throughout the cooking process by continuously monitoring temp fluctuations & making constant adjustments every second to maintain the set temp to ensure perfect results

DUAL HEAT ZONES - Customize the top, bottom heaters and convection fan independently for true surround cooking. To bake a perfect pizza, set bottom heaters at full power & top heaters at 30% for crispy crunch crust and perfectly melted cheesy toppings

CARRYOVER COOKING - Bravo also features carryover cooking mode. It compensates for the carryover cooking that will inevitably occur after cooking. When engaged, this feature ensures that the meat or fish is not overcooked while resting

WHAT’S INCLUDED – Bravo XL Air Fryer Toaster Smart Oven comes with 1 non-stick broiler rack and baking pan, 1 air fry basket, 2 heavy-duty wire cooking rack, 1 crumb tray, 1 smart digital thermostat, 1 owner’s manual, 1 quick start guide, and 1 recipe book

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dimensions are mislabeled.
reviews.reviewText: There are several ads for products that look just like this and I ordered this based on reading one of the other ads then tried to cancel it once I read the ad again that said it was 16" high. I was too late and the oven was delivered. Thankfully, the add was wrong. It is 20 wide, 13 deep, 12 high.It is really a nice size and works great. I bought it to replace a 2 door air fryer oven that set off my smoke alarm and was a mess to clean. This item is much easier to clean and doesn't set off my smoke detector. The controls are fairly easy and become intuitive if you read the manual.It works great on pizza. I mainly use it for air frying meats. I bought a cheap bake tray at dollar tree that I use to catch the greece and it makes the oven easy to clean. I use it for almost every meal and it works fine.The trays are deep enough for me to fix 2 burgers, some mushrooms, and asparagus on the same tray. This is my 3rd air fryer oven and it is already my favorite.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adventures in Cooking,One Stop Shop !
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. "The NuWave Bravo XL is an excellent countertop oven. While I've had other small countertop ovens, so far, this the best. Cooking temperatures are even. The air fry basket and multiple (shelves) are an extra as is the enamel broiling rack and baking pan. The unit is easy to operate and clean. The "Smart" preset cooking/baking temperatures, and the included temperature probe, are nice additional "features". I just received my Bravo XL yesterday and I couldn't be more happy with it. I just tried it for the first time to get a feel for it and I have to say WOW !!! I'm just getting started exploring all the features of this oven, but so far, it's surpassed my expectations. The very first feature I utilized was the air fryer, to my complete satisfaction it did not disappoint. Take a look at the Crispy Air Fried Fish Fillets ! YUM ! I'm particularly pleased at the even heating inside the oven chamber -- no hot or cold spots -- everything comes out evenly cookedI very much enjoy cooking, and have used similar products like this one in my many years of preparing food. I thought the instructions were a bit vague but I easily figured it out as it is easy to use from the first use. I didn't whip up anything fancy but something simple. I had fresh battered fish fillets so I set the oven to air fry and the temperature sets automatically. I set the timer for 10 minute and just like that I had delirious hot fish that was as good if not better because I didn't use a single drop of oil. A little sea salt and fresh cracked black pepper the the fish fillets were flavorable and crisp. I'm thoroughly addicted and can't wait to try all the many other foods I can prepare next ! There is a bit of learning curve so I caution everyone to please read the instruction book that comes with the oven. It is fairly easy to figure out and the instructions booklet breaks everything down.After learning how it works, the oven is great, easy to use, accurate, and cooks excellently. It is very flexible for cooking different foods and cooking styles, and the recipe book will come in handy as well.This convection oven has a ton of different settings to meet all of your cooking needs...I really enjoy having a probe included with the oven as it's always good to have a food thermometer handy. The airfryer makes frozen goods more crisp than if you were using a traditional oven. And, it cooks any meat (poultry, pork, beef, seafood etc.) without a problem. As for baked goods, using the "bake" setting is a snap ! The biggest pro is how fast it heats up and gets to cooking. It doesn't take nearly as long as my traditional stove-top oven. I can't wait to see what the dehydrator will accomplish, and also the yogurt function 😃 The Bravo XL is truly a "One Stop Shop"and I would 100% recommend the NuWave Bravo XL to anyone looking for a new toaster oven and/or anyone trying to get their feet wet, so to speak, with new adventures in cooking !😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Deal for the Price
reviews.reviewText: I've had this oven for about a month at this writing. The presets are quite useful. So are the buttons on the front, like Toast. All controls are digital. Time and temperature is changed by rotating a knob. Stop and start is accomplished by pressing the knob.It beeps really loud every time you press a button. The first thing I looked up in the manual was the Mute function (press SEAR + STAGE simultaneously). I just have to keep an eye on it when it is running to figure out when it turns off.You can change the time and temp on the fly. It's very easy to add a little more time. When you open the door, there are hooks on the inside of the door that pull out the rack a little if you use the center position. Good for toast, for example. The top gets pretty warm and I use that to preheat plates.It is a convection oven and an air fryer. The convection fan is on the right side of the unit along with the controls. When using the convection baking, it is a really good idea to rotate the food in the oven periodically since the side closest to the fan will get hotter. Unlike an air fryer that blows down from the top, the hot side is the right side. I had an air fryer that had the fan mounted in the top and the heat when air frying was much more even, direct and effective. Since it was blowing across the top mounted heater elements. Not so here. I think the higher the temperature, the greater the unbalance. Your mileage may vary.All in all, it's a good toaster oven for the money. You can get fairly large things inside thanks to the side mounted circulating fan. You just have to be mindful to turn the dish every five or ten minutes for even cooking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A bit confusing
reviews.reviewText: Great little oven it works perfectly for me as a mostly single person. And plenty big enough to use when my kids are here.However, and I saw a post before buying the oven about it being confusing to use. I thought that was a silly thing to say.I was you need to pay attention when toggling between functions. To turn the oven on there is an On/Off button,than a menu button, than toggle to bake, toggle to oven temp, and than toggle to cooking time, and finally push the start button. If you mess that up the oven won’t start preheating which leaves you starting the process over. And there several other functions as well, not just bake.I am sure given time and more use; this will become second nature.I would not buy this for my mom. She has a hard enough time using a flip phoneThe oven is jam packed full of functions, features and buttons. In my mind sometimes less is more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little oven.
reviews.reviewText: About the size of my microwave. I bought it so I could get rid of my microwave. (And toaster) It works well, takes a little adjusting to how it works. Takes a little longer to reheat food, and is faster for toast, so don’t just walk away from your toast. Easy to clean, easy to use!
